text: Remo Forrer (born 8 September 2001) is a Swiss singer. He is from the Canton of St. Gallen. In 2020, Forrer won the third season of the Swiss version of The Voice. He also participated in the German version of I Can See Your Voice. In 2023, he represented Switzerland in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with his first song "Watergun". He finished in 20th place in the final. == Sources == Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from the canton of St. Gallen
title: Remo Forrer
